page.title: 18A Day in the Life of...
page.content: EVERY MORNING WHEN I GET UP I GET DRESSED AND HAVE MY BREAKFAST.AFTER I HAVE HAD MY BREAKFAST AT 8.30 I CALL FOR MY FRIEND SANDRA AND THEN WE GO TO SCHOOL.ON MONDAY THE FIRST THING WE HAVE IS(OFF WE GO) AND IF YOU DON'T FINISH BEFORE BREAK YOU HAVE TO FINISH AFTER AND THEN YOU GET IT MARKED.THEN WE DO OUR MATHS LIKE MULTIPLYING BY TWO NUMBERS.YOU DO TEN SUMS OR MORE IN EACH EXERCISE.IF YOU GET SOME SUMS WRONG YOU HAVE TO DO THEM AGAIN.WE THEN HAVE OUR DINNER AT 12.00 BUT SOME OF THE SCHOOL TAKE PACKED LUNCH BUT SOMETIMES WE HAVE IT ON THE GRASS OR IN THE HALL.AFTER THAT WE GO IN TO DO OUR WORKAFTER THE LAST BREAK THE TEACHER READS A STORY AND WHEN IT IS 3.40 THE BELL GOES AND THEN I PUT MY COAT ON AND WAIT FOR SANDRA AND WE GO HOME. SUSAN LAVERICK.
